page.title: 08Old People's Homes
page.content: There are three old people's homes in Slyne-with-Hest. Slyne House is a purpose built old peoples home ,all the rooms are on the same level. Greenroyd is a large converted detached house ,as is Lonsdale House. There is a new complex of sheltered accommodation being built close to St Luke's primary school in Slyne-With-Hest. The reason why there are so many old people's homes in Slyne- With-Hest is that the environment is very relaxing and the sea air is healthy.Old people enjoy the quiet atmosphere and beautiful surroundings of Slyne-With-Hest.
